findings.title: Redundant initialization of variables to their default value.
findings.description: In the constructor of SPX smart contract and SPXCrowdsale contract, variables are assigned a zero(0) value which is the default value for uint type variables in Solidity.

findings.title: SafeMath library not used for an arithmetic operation
findings.description: In the contribute() function of SPXCrowdsale contract, Solidity's += operator is used instead of SafeMath's add() function.

findings.title: Revert reason strings not provided.
findings.description: require() statements are used without providing revert reason strings, which is a standard practice to always provide revert reasons in require statements.
